sentence.Network_en: They are offering farmers $2.15 a bushel for corn.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们向农民出价每蒲式耳2.15美元收购玉米。

sentence.Network_en: The company is now offering to double-glaze the windows for £3,900.
sentence.Network_cn: 该公司现在报价3,900英镑安装双层玻璃窗。

sentence.Network_en: We have been successful because we are offering a quality service.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们因提供的服务水准一流一直经营得很成功。

entry.def: An offering is something that is specially produced to be sold.

example.ex: It was very, very good, far better than vegetarian offerings in many a posh restaurant.
example.tran: 这道菜真是人间美味，远远超过很多豪华餐厅的素食菜品。

entry.def: An offering is a gift that people offer to their God or gods as a form of worship.

example.ex: ...the holiest of the Shinto rituals, where offerings are made at night to the great Sun.
example.tran: 神道教仪式中最神圣的时刻，即在晚间祭祀“天照大神”太阳神

means.word_mean: 1. something offered (as a proposal or bid);

sentences.sentence: "noteworthy new offerings for investors included several index funds"

means.word_mean: 2. money contributed to a religious organization
4. the act of contributing to the funds of a church or charity;

auth_sentence.content: Revisionism is already offering alternative views of his achievements.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Revisionism is already offering alternative views of his achievements.

auth_sentence.content: The difference will be in the customer service offering.

stems_affixes.word_buile: aqui水+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来水的
differ[v.不同]+ent表形容词→adj.不同的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fert=fer带来,拿来+ile能……的→能带来粮食→肥沃的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有花的,开花的,多花的,花盛开的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flori=flor花+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来花→有花的
in不+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已" →冷漠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能推理的, 能推论的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infer[v.推论,推断]+able能……的→adj.能推理的, 能推论的
infer[v.推论,推断]+ent+ial……的→adj.推论性的
odori=odor气味+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来气味的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可归[起]因于……的, 可归入……的; 与……有关的
stems_affixes.word_buile: refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+able能……的→能提到的,能找到原因的→可归于……
suffer[v.受苦]+able能……的→adj.可容忍的,可忍耐的
transfer[n.&v.转移;转换;转让;过户;迁移;改乘]+able能……的→adj.可转让的
aqui水+fer带来,拿来→n.含水土层, 蓄水层
confer[v.商讨;授予,颁给[勋衔,学位等]]+ence表名词→n.[正式]会议;讨论,商谈

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给予, 商量, 授予
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+fer带来,拿来+ment表名词→共同带来东西→给予[奖品等]
coni松果+fer带来,拿来→带来松果的树→针叶树

stems_affixes.value_cn: 针叶树的,松类的,结球果的
stems_affixes.word_buile: conifer[n.针叶树]+ous……的→n.针叶树的,松类的,结球果的
defer敬从+ence表名词→n.敬意,尊重
defer推迟+ment表名词→n.推迟;延迟
differ[v.不同]+ence表名词→n.不同
fer带来,拿来+ry状态,性质→带来带去
fertile[adj.肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的]+ity表名词→n.肥沃,丰饶
fertilize[v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃]+er表名词→n.[fertiliser]肥料
of一再+fer带来,拿来→一再带来→提供
offer[v.提供,提议,出现 n.出价,提议,意图]+ing表名词→n.报盘,提供的货物
prefer[v.[to]更喜欢,宁愿]+ence表名词→n.[for,to]偏爱,喜爱;优惠;优先选择
pro向前+ffer=fer带来,拿来→带到前面去→贡献出来
refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+ee人→被双方提及的人→裁判

stems_affixes.value_cn: 提及,涉及;参考,参考书目;证明书[人]

refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+endum表名词→提出[候选人]→选举

dif不同+fer带来→带来不同→不同
different[adj.不同的]+iate做→v.区分,区别;[使]不同
fer带来,拿来+ry状态,性质→带来带去
fertile[adj.肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的]+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃

pre先+fer带来→预先就带来→更喜欢

Sentence.sentence: But the 1980s brought new competition from Japanese film company Fuji Photo, which undermined Kodak by offering lower prices for film and photo supplies.
Similarly, using Airbnb or a car-hire service for the first time encourages people to try other offerings
Offering a job to a man is the safer bet.
the wireless carrier offering the iPhone in the United States, had a more reliable network, said Andrew Yu, mobile devices platform project manager at M.I.T.
Well, we're offering an all-inclusive two-week trip to Mexico for only 300 dollars.

sentences.en: For a man who held that to take even an ant’s life is evil, the offering of a million lives gives one pause.
sentences.cn: 一个不忍心踩死蚂蚁的人却不珍惜千百万条的生命, 确实令人深思。

means.word_mean: (争吵后为表示歉意送的)和平礼物，谢罪礼

sentences.en: He left a box of chocolates as a peace offering, hoping that she would forgive him.
sentences.cn: 他留下一盒巧克力作为谢罪礼，希望她能够原谅他。
